roleset.name: spend inappropriately, waste
roleset.note: MISSPEND-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls spend_time-104. (from misspend.01-v)

example.name: only in passive?
example.text: The state has sued these charities in state court, complaining that [much of the money]-1 was grossly misspent *trace*-1; 82%, says Mr. Ormstedt, went to fund raisers and most of the rest to the people who ran the charities and to their relatives -- for fur coats, trips to Florida, Lucullan restaurant tabs.

example.name: active?
example.text: John misspent his youth learning classical languages.
